mapper.select: SELECT sender.id as senderId, sender.username as senderUsername, sender.face_image as senderFaceImage, sender.face_image_big as senderFaceImageBig, sender.nickname as senderNickname, sender.qrcode as senderQrcode, sender.client_id as senderClientId, fr.id AS requestId FROM friends_request fr LEFT JOIN users sender ON fr.send_user_id = sender.id WHERE fr.accept_user_id = #{acceptUserId} AND fr.status = #{status.code}

SELECT u.id as id, u.username as username, u.face_image as faceImage, u.face_image_big as faceImageBig, u.nickname as nickname, u.qrcode as qrcode FROM users u LEFT JOIN friends_relation fr ON u.id = fr.friend_user_id WHERE fr.me_user_id = #{myUserId}
